Is That A Truce? Virat Kohli Is All Praises For 'Outstanding' Rohit Sharma After His Twin Centuries

Is That A Truce? Virat Kohli Is All Praises For 'Outstanding' Rohit Sharma After His Twin Centuries

Virat Kohli was all praises for Rohit Sharma after India’s win over South Africa in the first Test.

Star Sports

Rohit, who looked in ominous touch gave a good account of his expressive self and scored two centuries in the same Test and was called ‘outstanding’ by Indian captain.

“When you put 500 on the board, you’re always ahead. Even with the fight they showed, we still had a lead. Rohit was outstanding. Mayank brilliant,” said Kohli in the post-match presentation ceremony. “Shami has been a strike bowler in the second innings. All the guys lived up to their strengths.”

PTI

There were lot of question marks over Rohit’s suitability and adaptability to the opening slot before the Test match. But after stroking a classy 176 in the first innings, he followed it up with another eye catching knock of 127 to lay the foundation for India’s victory.

The praise from Virat Kohli might come as a surprise for many. There have been lots of rumours around the pair not being on good terms, but there was little to indicate that when Kohli praised the brilliance of Rohit Sharma.

AFP

The stories of discontent have been doing the rounds for quite some time. Media reports suggested that things are not okay between the two of them ever since we lost the World Cup semifinal to New Zealand.

Rohit had even stopped following Kohli on Instagram as well as his wife Anushka Sharma. But the team management and BCCI had refuted rumours of a rift between the pair, even going on to call the stories fabricated.

But after praising Rohit Sharma for his performance, the two might have finally called it a truce.

(With Inputs From IANS)
